messages.message: Does anyone else regularly get OOM errors when trying to build our Javascript? Is there a fix?
I do!! Was just chatting with Warren about it yesterday and am going to try to find a fix today because it’s getting to be unworkable for me
Ok! Yeah it's happening for me so regularly that it's almost impossible to test code
I've been getting it recently now too
@warren were you recently altering the JS configuration? Maybe you can take a look?
I was actually getting this a while ago too, it's just gotten worse recently
These are the issues I've been reading: https://github.com/webpack/webpack/issues/1914 and https://github.com/webpack/webpack-dev-server/issues/1433
The most recent comment in that first issue said that when they upgraded node the problem disappeared... maybe we can try that?
I haven’t altered the JS config in the last few weeks
I’ll take a look as well today

Temporary fix for people who are being blocked by this:
Run `export NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096` before running `make build-local`
